segments.text: I think this scene captures a moment of pure domestic irony.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is lost in her dish-drying routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink betrays her with its overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pools around her feet, unseen and unheeded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool is thrilling yet terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snatching cookies from the high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists from below, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the unstable stool fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall could mean injury in that wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside highlights the interior's peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a poignant reminder of unnoticed risks at home.
segments.speaker: PAR
